faq.title: Everything you need to know
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before taking back control.

slowDown.q: Will Scaliente slow down my Shopify site?
slowDown.a: Absolutely not. Scaliente works via the official Shopify API and connects in the background. No script is injected onto your storefront, so zero impact on loading times or Core Web Vitals.

customTheme.q: My store uses a custom theme, is it compatible?
customTheme.a: Yes, Scaliente is compatible with 100% of Shopify themes (2.0 and older). Since we don't alter your theme code, everything works perfectly regardless of your visual setup.

installation.q: Is it complicated to install? I'm not a dev.
installation.a: Scaliente installs in 3 steps: (1) Add the app from the Shopify App Store with one click, (2) Authorize read-only OAuth access to your Shopify store, (3) Connect your ad accounts (Meta, Google, TikTok, Pinterest, Snapchat) via secure OAuth. Your profit dashboard populates with data in under 2 minutes. No coding or technical expertise required.

security.a: Scaliente uses read-only API access to Shopify and ad platforms ‚Äî it cannot modify your store or ad accounts. All data is encrypted with AES-256 at rest and TLS 1.3 in transit. Scaliente does not sell, share, or transfer your data to third parties. The app is hosted on Vercel's SOC 2 compliant infrastructure.

shopifyAnalytics.q: Why not just use Shopify Analytics?
shopifyAnalytics.a: Shopify Analytics displays gross revenue but does not calculate net profit. For example, if your Shopify store generates ‚Ç¨10,000 in revenue but you spent ‚Ç¨3,000 on Meta Ads, ‚Ç¨2,000 on COGS, ‚Ç¨800 on shipping, and ‚Ç¨400 on Stripe fees, Shopify shows ‚Ç¨10,000 while your real profit is only ‚Ç¨3,800. Scaliente deducts all these costs automatically and updates every 5 minutes.

commitment.a: Zero commitment. You can cancel your Scaliente subscription in one click from your dashboard at any time. Your access continues until the end of your current billing period. No cancellation fees, no hidden charges.

story.q: Why have I never heard of Scaliente before?
story.a: Scaliente launched in 2024 as a private profit-tracking tool for e-commerce agencies managing multi-store Shopify portfolios. After reaching 2,500 active users through word-of-mouth referrals, Scaliente opened to the public with self-serve plans starting at ‚Ç¨0/month (Discovery plan, 20 orders/month included).

seo.title: How to use the ROAS calculator
seo.p1: ROAS (Return on Ad Spend) measures the revenue generated for every euro spent on advertising. A ROAS of 3x means that for every €1 invested in ads, you generate €3 in revenue.
seo.p2: The breakeven ROAS is the minimum ROAS needed to cover all your costs (product, shipping, payment fees) and reach the breakeven point. Below this threshold, every sale loses you money.
seo.p3: POAS (Profit on Ad Spend) goes further by measuring actual profit relative to ad spend. A POAS of 1x means your profit exactly covers your ad spend.

privacy.intro: At SCALIENTE LLC, we take the protection of your data very seriously. This Privacy Policy details how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our Scaliente application.

items.title: 1. Information Collection
items.content:
We collect the following types of information to provide our service:

a) Account Information: When you create an account, we collect your name, email address, and encrypted password.
b) Connected Platform Data: With your explicit authorization (via OAuth), we access data from your Shopify stores (orders, products) and your advertising accounts (Meta Ads, Google Ads, TikTok Ads, Snapchat Ads, Pinterest Ads) to calculate your profitability metrics. We only collect the data strictly necessary (ad spend, revenue, costs).

items.title: 2. Data Usage
items.content:
Your data is used exclusively to:
- Provide you with real-time profitability dashboards and analytics.
- Improve our services and develop new features.
- Ensure the security of your account and prevent fraud.
- Communicate with you regarding your subscription or important updates.

items.title: 3. Data Sharing
items.content:
We never sell your personal data. We only share your information with the following third parties, necessary for the operation of the service:
- Vercel & Supabase: For hosting and database (secure and GDPR/CCPA compliant).
- Stripe: For secure payment processing.
- Crisp: For customer support (chat).

We require all our processors to comply with strict security and confidentiality standards.

items.title: 4. Google Limited Use Disclosure
items.content: Scaliente's use and transfer to any other app of information received from Google APIs will adhere to the Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements.

items.title: 5. Meta Platform Terms Compliance
items.content:
In accordance with Meta Platform Terms:
- We only use Meta Ads data to provide aggregated analytics to the user.
- We do not transfer, sell, or use this data for surveillance or profiling outside of the Scaliente service.
- You can revoke Scaliente's access to your Meta data at any time via your Facebook account settings.

items.title: 6. Data Security
items.content: We implement robust technical and organizational security measures to protect your data: encryption in transit (TLS/SSL) and at rest (AES-256), strict access controls, and regular security audits.

items.title: 7. Your Rights
items.content: In accordance with GDPR and CCPA, you have the right to access, rectify, delete, and port your data. To exercise these rights, contact us at scalientesolutions@gmail.com.

items.title: 8. Data Retention
items.content: We retain your data as long as your account is active. If you delete your account, your data is deleted from our active servers immediately and from our backups within 30 days, unless otherwise required by law.
